headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 36.7 CFM
description: Single Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump          Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Leybold S60A
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model S60A
Pumping Speed 36.7 CFM (1,037.0 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 2.00E-2(En) torr (2.67E-2 mbar)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower 2 HP
